column4: can anyone help me? I uninstalled my ubuntu x86 8.10 so I could use Kubuntu 64bit 8.10 and now the X won't even open up for an installation much less actually using it
what graphics card do you have, i doubt its the issue, but it might be cause you dont have the restricted drivers (ATI/Nvidia)
try getting the restricted drivers, but i don't know the package name
